publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2348 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIsâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the following instruments be approved: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No. 6) (Scotland) Order 2001 (SSI 2001/316); and The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (East Coast) (Scotland) Order 2001 (SSI 2001/317); and The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No. 7) (Scotland) Order 2001 (SSI 2001/322). Supported by: Euan Robson*
